Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh... <sp:5:0:0>What is it? <sp:5:0:0>What could you need
from an old man so early in the morning?
Talk_30:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_00>This laboratory is mostly used by a pair of
researchers—Purah and Robbie.<sp:0:4:0>Nobody used it for a long spell, but now
it seems Robbie's back.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_00>Better find where I put those earplugs...
Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_00>Yes? <sp:5:0:0>What, do you see an old man out
walking and assume he's got nothing but
free time?
Talk_31:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Everything to do with the pasture, I leave
up to my son, Dantz.<sp:0:4:0>Tomorrow morning, I'm due to take the
Cuccos to the <clr:0000>laboratory<clr:ffff> on top of the
hill again.<sp:0:4:0><snd:Ease>But right now, I'm bound for bed.
Talk_32:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you have questions about the pasture,
ask my son, Dantz.<sp:0:4:0>I'm busy right now taking the Cuccos on
a walk up the hill to the <clr:0000>laboratory<clr:ffff>.
Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The Cuccos are due for their walk up the
hill to the <clr:0000>laboratory<clr:ffff> after this. Just as
soon as I work myself up to it.<sp:0:4:0>Care to join us?
Talk_33:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Notice_00>Huh?! <sp:5:0:0>What are you doing in my house?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Well...I don't have much to offer you here,
but make yourself at home.
Talk_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I might not seem busy to you, but taking
care of the Cuccos that Tamana left in my
care is a big part of my day.<sp:0:4:0><snd:Think_01>I thought I'd help her out a bit now that
her husband's gone to do his part over at
Lookout Landing.<sp:0:4:0>Every day, I take them on a walk up the
hill to the <clr:0000>laboratory<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:0:0>Though it seems
the place is already closed for today.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease_01>Well, I may be retired, but I still worry
about the <clr:0000>pasture<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:0:0>I should get home
soon to check in on things.
Talk_34:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_01>Huh?! <sp:5:0:0>You again, eh?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Well, I can't offer much hospitality...<sp:5:0:0>but
you can share in whatever I do have.
near_02: I need to get home soon...
Talk_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Sad>Taking the Cuccos on their walk every day
is good exercise for me too.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a01>But I wish I hadn't trained 'em to want to
go all the way up the hill to the <clr:0000>laboratory<clr:ffff>
at the top.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Though it seems the place is already
closed for today.<sp:0:4:0><snd:Ease>Well, I may be retired, but I still worry
about the <clr:0000>pasture<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:0:0>I should get home
soon to check in on things.
Talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease_01>Oh... <sp:5:0:0>What business does someone so
young have being out at this hour?
Talk_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Everything to do with the pasture, I leave
up to my son, Dantz.<sp:0:4:0>My only job these days is looking after
the Cuccos that Tamana left in my care.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00>I thought I'd help her out a bit now that
her husband's gone to do his part over at
Lookout Landing.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Every day, I take the Cuccos on a walk up
the hill to the <clr:0000>laboratory<clr:ffff>.
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_00>More rain, huh? <sp:5:0:0>The humidity makes my
joints ache something fierce.
Talk_24:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Wakeup>I've already been up the hill and back
today, so it's about time I went to bed.<sp:0:4:0>You should head home yourself before it
gets late.
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I might not seem busy to you, but taking
care of the Cuccos that Tamana left in my
care is a big part of my day.<sp:0:4:0><snd:Chat_00>I thought I'd help her out a bit now that
her husband's gone to do his part over at
Lookout Landing.<sp:0:4:0>Every day, I take the Cuccos on a walk up
the hill to the <clr:0000>laboratory<clr:ffff>.
Talk_25:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Everything to do with the pasture, I leave
up to my son, Dantz.<sp:0:4:0>I'm bound for bed now.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Chat_00>Tomorrow morning, I'm due to take the
Cuccos to the <clr:0000>laboratory<clr:ffff> on top of the
hill again.<sp:0:4:0>For a retired old guy, I sure have a lot on
my plate...
Talk_26:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh... <sp:5:0:0>What is it? <sp:5:0:0>What could you need
from an old man?
Talk_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I might not seem busy to you, but taking
care of the Cuccos that Tamana left in my
care is a big part of my day.<sp:0:4:0><snd:Think_01>I thought I'd help her out a bit now that
her husband's gone to do his part over at
Lookout Landing.<sp:0:4:0>Every day, I take the Cuccos on a walk up
the hill to here.
Talk_27:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Sad>When Purah and Robbie were around in
the laboratory, they worked morning to
night banging away at their inventions.<sp:0:4:0>Truth to tell, ever since they left, it's been
lonesome without that racket.
Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Taking the Cuccos on their walk every day
is good exercise for me too.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>But I wish I hadn't trained 'em to want to
go all the way up the hill to the <clr:0000>laboratory<clr:ffff>
at the top.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad>They walk faster than I do. It pushes an
old man to his limits, I tell you.
Talk_28:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I took the trouble to come up here so I
could say hello to Robbie.<sp:0:4:0>But of course, he wasted no time diving
into his work. Guess I'll try again later.
Talk_29:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_00>This laboratory is mostly used by a pair of
researchers—Purah and Robbie.<sp:0:4:0>You could always hear them at work, from
morning to night.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Ease>When they're here, I can't stand the
noise. But then while they're gone,
I can't stand the quiet.
Talk_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>If you have questions about the pasture,
ask my son, Dantz.<sp:0:4:0>My only job these days is looking after
the Cuccos that Tamana left in my care.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_01>I thought I'd help her out a bit now that
her husband's gone to do his part over at
Lookout Landing.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Why, I've got a full schedule today looking
after the critters. <sp:5:1:0>I'm taking them on a
walk up the hill to the <clr:0000>laboratory<clr:ffff> now.
Talk_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>If you have questions about the pasture,
my son, Dantz, handles all that now.<sp:0:4:0>My only job these days is looking after
the Cuccos that Tamana left in my care.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_01>I thought I'd help her out a bit now that
her husband's gone to do his part over at
Lookout Landing.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>The Cuccos are due for their walk up the
hill to the <clr:0000>laboratory<clr:ffff> after this. Just as
soon as I work myself up to it.
